objective: Multiple users across different departments can't access shared files on the network drive

problem_context.focus: User-specific issues, account permissions, and basic troubleshooting.
questions: Can you verify the user accounts of the affected users have the necessary permissions to access the network drive?
Are the users able to authenticate successfully to the network drive server?
Are there any known issues with user authentication or directory services that might be affecting access?
Can you check the user's group memberships to ensure they are part of the appropriate groups that grant access to the network drive?
problem_context.prior_findings: Network Support: The firewall rule denying access to port 3389 from external sources is likely blocking access from t
